entry.title: Free 30-day trial to the electronic edition of the AJA
entry.content:
For those without access to JSTOR:

Free 30-day trial to the electronic edition of the AJA
The electronic edition of the AJA is hosted on the JSTOR platform, which offers powerful discovery and linking tools, table of contents alerts, the ability to save, email, and export citations, and other helpful research features.

With this free trial, you will have 30 days of access to the past 8 years of the AJA. Become a subscriber before your free trial expires, and you will receive your first annual subscription at a reduced rate. If you do not wish to subscribe after this trial period, your access will simply expire.
This offer is open to new individual subscribers only. Please complete the form [here] to set up your trial access today!
